attributes.action: Change the Law on Rape- Remove the Word 'Penis' to allow women to be convicted.
attributes.additional_details:
Male suicide is on the rise. There are a distinct lack of charities dedicated to male victims of abuse. We believe changing the law to protect men is a small step towards helping abuse victims feel validated.
This petition was created by women, who feel it is vital to ensure female perpetrators are treated equally to male.
attributes.background:
In the UK, women cannot be convicted of rape because they do not have a penis. This serves to belittle the horrific experiences of men and women who have been sexually assaulted by females.
This a petition to remove the word 'penis' from the rape statute, to ensure both sexes are treated equally.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly how you'd like Parliament to change the law.

You may wish to sign this petition instead: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/200661
